meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Andy Thai | CS @ University of Washington

header.h2: Computer Science Undergraduate @ University of Washington, Seattle

main.p: A first-generation upcoming fourth-year student pursuing a degree in Computer Science and minoring in Business at the University of Washington Seattle, set to graduate in the Spring of 2024. Sufficient knowledge of Java, Python, C, SQL, and SQL++. A collaborative and detail-oriented individual, who is searching for internships and research labs related to these skills.

Always optimistic and enthusiastic about opportunities, ready to take on any challenges and learn from them. Communicative while collaborating with peers and mentors alike to tackle class projects as a team.
To learn more about my work history, check out my resume. Thanks for stopping by!
